short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our Google Chrome extension for Docmate. Helps you easily Contribute and chat with your MedMate

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This innovative extension allows users to share any interesting medical resource on their platform and communicate with a chatbot. Whether it's articles, studies, educational videos, or testimonials, this extension enables easy and efficient sharing. Additionally, it integrates an intuitive chatbot that allows users to communicate and interact in real-time to obtain additional information to their medical questions. With this extension, collaboration and sharing of medical knowledge are facilitated, thereby strengthening the medical community as a whole.
